document_data.name: Flardryn Starym
document_data.mainbody: '''Flardryn Starym''' was an inhabitant of [[Myth Drannor]] in the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Flardryn Starym was one of the [[Starym]] scrying on the court when [[Llombaerth Starym]] attempted to slay [[Coronal]] [[Eltargrim]] and failed.
